state.code:
%% Soulday.app – Entity Relationship Diagram v1.0
erDiagram
    User ||--o{ PersonalityProfile : "has"
    User ||--o{ ContextPreference : "prefers"
    User ||--o{ VerificationBadge : "holds (0–3 stars)"
    User ||--o{ Match : "participates in"
    User ||--o{ ReportedIssue : "reports / is target"
    PersonalityProfile }|--|| PersonalityType : "classified as (59 types)"
    PersonalityType }|--|{ CompatibilityMatrix : "has compatibility entry"
    CompatibilityMatrix }o--|| ContextPreference : "context-aware"
    Match }|--|| Interaction : "generates"
    SystemConfig ||--o{ "all entities" : "configures"

    User {
        string userId PK
        string username
        int verificationLevel "0–3"
        float trustScore "0–100"
        timestamp createdAt
    }
    PersonalityProfile {
        string profileId PK
        jsonb bigFiveVector
        string mbtiType
        string enneagramType
        int primaryPersonalityTypeId
    }
    PersonalityType {
        string personalityTypeId PK "PT01..PT59"
        string name
        string description
        string keywords
    }
    CompatibilityMatrix {
        string matrixEntryId PK
        string typeAId FK
        string typeBId FK
        float compatibilityScore
        float complementarityScore
        string contextType
    }
